title: MLOps feature dive: Create event driven machine learning workflows
description:
In this video, you’ll learn how you can use Azure Event Grid and Azure Machine Learning to trigger and consume machine learnings events. We talk about why eventing is important and how you can enable scenarios such as run failure alerts and retraining models.

Jump To: 
[00:50] What is Event Grid?
[01:32] Why is this useful?
[02:32] Demo - How to set up an event subscription
[03:40] Demo - How to filter events
[05:30] Demo - Logic app example
